
# sample
[![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url]
[![build status][circle-image]][circle-url]
[![license][license-image]][license-url]

Generate a random sample from the Guassian distribution.

## Installation

    $ npm install samples

## Usage

```js
var sample = require('samples');
sample();
```
